title: Woven Portrait, ca. 1771
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: 4 & 1 satin with discontinuous supplementary wefts bound on the front in plain weave by a supplementary warp
dimensions: Warp x Weft (cut top & bottom; selvedge to selvedge): 105 x 76.5 cm (41 5/16 x 30 1/8 in.)
description: A woven portrait of the Comte de Provence is embroidered to the fabric that forms the frame. The frame is a woven wreath of multicolor flowers with a bow at the top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Woven Portrait, ca. 1771.
ca. 1771. Medium: silk
Technique: 4 & 1 satin with discontinuous supplementary wefts bound on the front in plain weave by a supplementary warp. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-265.
